content: the brooklyn sweater is made for stylish comfort and will be your go-to all throughout fall chic and simple it pairs effortlessly with high-waisted jeans or over dresses it s made with super chunky yarn so the project works up quickly and the easy top down construction means that there no sewing the pictures show a cropped sweater but since it s a top down sweater you can try on your project as you crochet and easily extend the length this pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
